messages.body:
Hello,
I'm having trouble accessing my Premium subscription features after my recent payment. The dashboard shows my account as 'Basic' even though I upgraded to Premium yesterday. Can you help me verify my subscription status?

Thanks,
Robert

Hi Robert,

Thanks for reaching out about your Premium subscription. I can see that your payment was processed successfully, but there seems to be a slight delay in the system updating your account status. I've manually triggered a refresh of your subscription status, and you should now have access to all Premium features.

Could you please try logging out and back in, then confirm if you can access the Premium features?

Let me know if you need any further assistance!

Best regards,
Emma

Hi Emma,

I've logged out and back in as suggested, but I'm still seeing the Basic features. When I go to the Account Settings page, it shows 'Premium (Pending)'. Is there something else I need to do to activate my subscription?

Best,
Robert
